item.title: T1 vs SIP For Business Telephone
item.description:
Large businesses with high call volumes require different telecommunications solutions compared to small offices. While T1 lines have been the traditional choice, SIP Trunking is emerging as a strong alternative. This article explores the pros and cons of each technology to help businesses make informed decisions. item.title: Can Hosted Voice Cut Your Phone Costs In Half?
item.description:
